topics.title: URL Shortener
topics.body: I'm assuming that this would have to be some sort of browser add on. Is there a way to shorten zeronet URLs basically just replace 127.0.0.1:43110 with something like 0net.

1@125.body: How about some way of sharing the content from a home computer to your portable device? Come to think of it what about have a ZeroNet box (raspberry pi?) and sharing to all of your devices? This would also let you use one username for sites like this.
